channel.title: Projects on Mattia Almansi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mattia Almansi

item.title: Denmark Strait
item.description: Denmark Strait is a channel located between Iceland and Greenland. Although the Strait is quite narrow, it plays a key role in the global climate system. The water masses that pass through Denmark Strait contribute significantly to the redistribution of heat between the poles and the equator. Several currents interact with each other and with the seafloor in Denmark Strait. We can disentangle different pathways by seeding particles in our model.

item.title: OceanSpy
item.description: A Python package to facilitate ocean model data analysis and visualization.
